posts.raw_content: Edgy humour is edgy humour.  The pearl clutching is especially rich coming from the party who actively supports and pushes for racist policies and legislation. There's far worse things said about White people by politicians and activists every day on X and in public, why would I care about private group chats between friends?  Especially when democrats are still supporting someone who fantasized about killing kids.  If it weren't for double standards, they'd have no standards.
